cat.lump.ir.sim.cl.clesa

Class SimilarityCLESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.Esa
      • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.SimilarityESA
        • cat.lump.ir.sim.cl.clesa.SimilarityCLESA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Similarity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimilarityCLESAdocs

    public abstract class SimilarityCLESA
extends SimilarityESA
    Implementation of Cross-Language Explicit Semantic Analysis, an extension of explicit semantic analysis proposed by:
    Potthast, Stein and Anderka. A Wikipedia-Based Multilingual Retrieval Model. In Advances in Information Retrieval. 30th European Conference on IR Research (ECIR 08), LNCS(4956), pages 522-530, 2008. Springer. ISBN 978-3-540-78645-0

    Since:
    April 18 2012
    Version:
    0.2.2
    Author:
    albarron
    See Also:
    cat.lump.ir.sim.Esa#

    • Method Detail

      • computeVectors

        protected EsaVectors computeVectors(java.io.File documentsPath,
                        java.lang.String object,
                        java.lang.String set)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: SimilarityESA
        Computes the vectors for the texts in the given set. If a previously computed object exists (and overrideObjects==False), it just loads the previously computed vectors.
        Specified by:
        computeVectors in class SimilarityESA
        Parameters:
        documentsPath - path to the documents
        object - name of the (previously generated object)
        set - whether we are processing A or B
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
